document.full_text: with the days of planting flags across the globe long gone, western european telecoms are unlikely to rush to merge even as deep-pocketed emerging market rivals entertain deals at the edges of their territory.
document.title: telecom empire building takes back seat
lines_and_colors: with the days of planting flags across the globe long gone, western european telecoms are unlikely to rush to merge even as deep-pocketed emerging market rivals entertain deals at the edges of their territory.
